name: Buildy Island 3d: Hire & Craft
description:
Build your own island, hire workers to do work for you!

Get resources, build and expanse to get even more resources!
You can do much stuff by yourself, but you can also hire workers who can do this work for you!

That is how you can build your Empire in Buildy Island!

Don't hesitate, just try it now and make your own decisions!
